# App Settings schema

- [<add> element for <appSettings>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/appsettings/add-element-for-appsettings.md): Learn more about: <add> element for <appSettings>
- [<appSettings> element for <configuration>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/appsettings/appsettings-element-for-configuration.md): Learn more about: <appSettings> element for <configuration>
- [<clear> element for <appSettings>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/appsettings/clear-element-for-appsettings.md): Learn more about: <clear> element for <appSettings>
- [App Settings schema](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/appsettings/index.md): Learn more about: App Settings schema
- [<remove> element for <appSettings>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/appsettings/remove-element-for-appsettings.md): Learn more about: <remove> element for <appSettings>
